name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genshin Impact HD Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adventure awaits in every new tab! Customize shortcuts, use a Google search bar, and enjoy stunning Genshin Impact wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Genshin Impact every time you open a new tab! With this extension, you’ll have quick access to a Google search bar, making your online exploration as smooth as gliding through Mondstadt’s skies. Popular site shortcuts are at your fingertips, and you can also add custom shortcuts to personalize your journey just like selecting your party.

Each new tab reveals a fresh Genshin Impact wallpaper, from breathtaking landscapes to epic character moments, keeping the magic alive with every click. There are 10 updated backgrounds, so your experience stays visually exciting.

Take control of your online adventure with fast access to your favorite sites and dynamic, ever-changing visuals inspired by the world of Teyvat. Whether you’re gearing up for battle or seeking serenity, this extension gives your browser a magical touch that’s as thrilling as the game itself.

Embark on your digital journey like a true Traveler!
